ranges.notes: Holiday atmosphere, many businesses closed, special celebrations in Piazza Maggiore
Gradually reopening businesses, Christmas decorations still visible in historic center
Holiday celebrating the 'good witch' who brings gifts to children, special events in Piazza Maggiore
Major shopping discounts throughout the city, especially in the historic center
Quiet winter period, fewer tourists, excellent time for museum visits without crowds
Romantic atmosphere in the city, special menus at restaurants, couples strolling under historic porticoes
Period before Lent with street celebrations, masquerade events, and traditional pastries
Early spring weather, moderate crowds before Holy Week, ideal for exploring historic center
Traditional zeppole di San Giuseppe (cream-filled pastries) in bakeries
Spring begins, increasing daylight hours, excellent time for exploring porticoes and historic sites
Significant religious processions throughout the historic center, particularly atmospheric in historic churches
Perfect spring weather, blooming flowers in Giardini Margherita, excellent conditions for outdoor activities
Ideal spring weather, perfect for exploring the historic center and surrounding hills
National holiday with parades, ceremonies, and some business closures
Ideal spring weather, perfect for outdoor exploration and dining under porticoes
Public holiday, many businesses closed but outdoor celebrations in Piazza Maggiore
Perfect spring weather, ideal for exploring historic sites and surrounding countryside
Month-long cultural festival celebrating Bologna's UNESCO World Heritage porticoes
Wineries in Colli Bolognesi open for tastings, excellent for day trips
Early summer weather, excellent for exploring outdoor sites and historic center
National holiday with celebrations in Piazza Maggiore and some business closures
Long daylight hours, perfect for evening strolls under porticoes and outdoor dining
Summer cultural festival with events in historic venues throughout the city
Outdoor performances in historic venues, concerts in piazzas, cultural events
Peak summer heat, many locals head to hills or coast, good time for early morning or evening activities
Peak summer heat, many locals away, some restaurant and shop closures
National holiday with widespread closures but special events in historic center
Continued heat and business closures; major tourist attractions remain open
Businesses begin to reopen as locals return from vacation
Perfect late summer weather, locals return, cultural activities resume
Ideal weather continues, perfect for exploring historic sites and taking day trips
Special access to historical sites and buildings normally closed to the public
Beautiful autumn weather, pleasant temperatures, ideal for sightseeing
Seasonal truffle, chestnut and mushroom events, wine harvest events in Colli Bolognesi
Not traditionally celebrated but increasing popularity with events at clubs and restaurants
Public holiday, many businesses closed, special masses at major churches
Traditional visits to cemeteries, special masses for the deceased
Autumn atmosphere, fewer tourists, excellent museum and indoor site visiting weather
Begin of the Christmas season preparation, festive decorations appearing
Pre-Christmas atmosphere, holiday decorations appearing throughout the city
Public holiday, start of Christmas season, lighting of city Christmas decorations
Holiday markets throughout the city, especially in historic center
Midnight Mass at historic churches, limited dining options but major hotels offer special meals
National holiday, continued celebrations, some businesses remain closed
Between Christmas and New Year's, festive atmosphere continues
Massive celebrations in Piazza Maggiore, fireworks, concerts and outdoor parties

scoreDescription.5: Excellent: Perfect conditions, special events, ideal weather, moderate crowds
scoreDescription.4: Good: Very favorable conditions, pleasant weather, manageable crowds
scoreDescription.3: Average: Standard conditions, typical weather, moderate to high tourism
scoreDescription.2: Below Average: Less ideal conditions, possibly unpleasant weather or very low/high tourism (business closures)
scoreDescription.1: Poor: Unfavorable conditions, extreme weather, overcrowded or very limited activities
